content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Users with a busy schedule want shorter workout sessions that fit into their daily routine.",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "A fitness mobile app that offers 10-15 minute workout sessions with a personalized routine based on the user's fitness level and preferences.",
    "content_solution": "A series of short workout videos on social media platforms like Instagram and TikTok that have different difficulty levels and are aimed at different fitness goals.",
    "competitors": ["Seven", "FitOn", "Aaptiv"],
    "differentiator": "Our app provides personalized workout plans based on the user's fitness level and preferences."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Users who want to learn new skills but have limited time need shorter, more frequent learning sessions.",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A microlearning platform that provides short, interactive lessons (5-10 minutes) on various skills, from cooking to coding.",
    "content_solution": "A YouTube channel that provides short, informative videos (under 5 minutes) on various topics, such as language learning, productivity, and personal finance.",
    "competitors": ["Skillshare", "Udacity", "LinkedIn Learning"],
    "differentiator": "Our platform focuses on microlearning, providing bite-sized lessons that fit into a busy schedule."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Users with limited time want to socialize with friends but can't commit to long events or outings.",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "A social networking app that connects users with nearby friends for short outings, such as coffee dates or walks.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that provides ideas and inspiration for short, fun outings with friends that don't take up too much time, such as picnics and museum visits.",
    "competitors": ["Meetup", "Bumble BFF", "Friender"],
    "differentiator": "Our app focuses on short, low-commitment outings that fit into a busy schedule."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Users with limited time want to keep their homes clean but don't have time for deep cleaning sessions.",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A cleaning service that offers short, focused cleaning sessions (30 minutes to an hour) on specific areas of the home, such as bathrooms or kitchens.",
    "content_solution": "A YouTube channel that provides short, informative videos on cleaning hacks and tips that can help users keep their homes clean in less time.",
    "competitors": ["Merry Maids", "Handy", "MaidPro"],
    "differentiator": "Our cleaning service focuses on short, targeted cleaning sessions that fit into a busy schedule."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Users with limited time want to eat healthy but don't have time to cook or meal prep.",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A meal delivery service that offers healthy, pre-portioned meals that can be heated up in minutes.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that provides ideas and inspiration for healthy meals that can be made in under 30 minutes, with tips for meal planning and prep.",
    "competitors": ["Blue Apron", "HelloFresh", "Freshly"],
    "differentiator": "Our meal delivery service focuses on healthy, pre-portioned meals that can be heated up quickly, without sacrificing taste or quality."
  }
]
